title: World stocks bask in U.S. jobs data glow
text:
World stocks bask in U.S. jobs data glow 9:12am EDT - 01:24 
World stocks have surged to a two-week high after strong U.S. jobs data at the end of last week helped take the edge of investors' concerns about the potential outbreak of a trade war between the United States and other major economies. Sonia Legg reports. â–² Hide
